info.title: AutoRest Azure Special Parameters Test Client

post.description: POST method with subscriptionId modeled in credentials.  Set the credential subscriptionId to '1234-5678-9012-3456' to succeed

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Should not appears as a method parameter - should come from credentials, and use value '1234-5678-9012-3456'

200.description: Successfully received the '1234-5678-9012-3456' credential value from credentials

post.description: POST method with subscriptionId modeled in credentials.  Set the credential subscriptionId to null, and client-side validation should prevent you from making this call

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Should not appears as a method parameter - should come from credentials, and use value '1234-5678-9012-3456'

200.description: This should never occur - you should be prevented from calling this method with null subscription Id in credentials

post.description: POST method with subscriptionId modeled in credentials.  Set the credential subscriptionId to '1234-5678-9012-3456' to succeed

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Should not appears as a method parameter - should come from credentials, and use value '1234-5678-9012-3456'

200.description: Successfully received the '1234-5678-9012-3456' credential value from credentials

post.description: POST method with subscriptionId modeled in the method.  pass in subscription id = '1234-5678-9012-3456' to succeed

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: This should appear as a method parameter, use value '1234-5678-9012-3456'

200.description: Successfully received the '1234-5678-9012-3456' credential value from the local parameter

post.description: POST method with subscriptionId modeled in the method.  pass in subscription id = null, client-side validation should prevent you from making this call

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: This should appear as a method parameter, use value null, client-side validation should prvenet the call

200.description: You should not reach this response - client side validation should prevent yopu from sending a null subscriptionId

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Should not appears as a method parameter - should come from credentials, and use value '1234-5678-9012-3456'

get.description: GET method with api-version modeled in global settings.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Should not appears as a method parameter - should come from the swagger spec version with value '2015-07-01-preview'

200.description: Successfully received the '2015-07-01-preview' api-version value from global client settings

get.description: GET method with api-version modeled in global settings.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Should not appears as a method parameter - should come from the swagger spec version with value '2015-07-01-preview'

200.description: Successfully received the '2015-07-01-preview' credential value from global client settings

get.description: Get method with api-version modeled in the method.  pass in api-version = '2.0' to succeed

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: This should appear as a method parameter, use value '2.0'

200.description: Successfully received the '2.0' api-version value from the local parameter

get.description: Get method with api-version modeled in the method.  pass in api-version = null to succeed

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: This should appear as a method parameter, use value null, this should result in no serialized parameter

200.description: Successfully received no api-version value from the local parameter

parameters.description: Should not appears as a method parameter - should come from the swagger spec version with value '2015-07-01-preview'

200.description: Successfully received the '2.0' api-version value from the local parameter

globalSubscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
globalSubscriptionId.description: The subscription id, which appears in the path, always modeled in credentials. The value is always '1234-5678-9012-3456'

localSubscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
localSubscriptionId.description: The subscriptionId, which appears in the path, the value is always '1234-5678-9012-3456'

globalApiVersion.name: api-version
globalApiVersion.description: The api version, which appears in the query, the value is always '2015-07-01-preview'

localApiVersion.name: api-version
localApiVersion.description: The api version, which appears in the query, the value is always '2.0'

unencodedPathParam.name: unencodedPathParam
unencodedPathParam.description: An unencoded path parameter with value 'path1/path2/path3'

unencodedQueryParam.name: q1
unencodedQueryParam.description: An unencoded query parameter with value 'value1&q2=value2&q3=value3'
